#!/bin/bash -xe
apt-get update
add-apt-repository -y ppa:ansible/ansible
apt-get -f install git ansible
cat << 'EOT' > /home/ubuntu/.ssh/config
Host github-drn88
User git
  Hostname github.com
  Port 22
  IdentityFile ~/.ssh/dpkey1.pem
  StrictHostKeyChecking no
  UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null
EOT
